#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stack>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long int inp()
    {
    long int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
struct time1
{
    long int a,b;
    bool operator< (const time1& that) const
    {
        if(this->a < that.a)
            return true;
        else if(this->a > that.a)
            return false;
        else
            return this->b < that.b;
    }
};
int main()
{
    int t;
    long int c,i,count;
    stack<int> temp1,temp2;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        c=inp();
        time1 var[c];
        for(i=0;i<c;i++)
        {
            var[i].a=inp();
            var[i].b=inp();
        }
        sort(var,var+c);
        temp1.push(var[0].a);
        temp2.push(var[0].b);
        count=1;
        for(i=1;i<c;i++)
        {
            if(var[i].a>=temp2.top())
            {
                temp1.push(var[i].a);
                temp2.push(var[i].b);
                count++;
            }
            else if(var[i].b<temp2.top())
            {
                temp2.pop();
                temp1.pop();
                temp1.push(var[i].a);
                temp2.push(var[i].b);
            }
        }
        printf("%ld\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
